column1: * 1932 - Father Christmas writes a Letters from Father Christmas to J.R.R. Tolkiens children.

column2: the first translation into Spanish of The Hobbit

column1: * 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien conducts an Index:Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: published as "The Man Who Understands Hobbits".

column1: * 1966 - Letters to an American Lady is released.
* 1987 - The Lost Road and Other Writings is published in the US.
* 1989 - The Treason of Isengard is published in the US.
* 2014 - Tolkiens Great War (documentary) by Zander and Elliot Weaver is released.
* 2017 - There Would Always Be a Fairy-Tale will be published.
